item.title: Twelve people have died, including one gunman, and 29 others were taken to hospital after the incident which Police have described as a terror attack targeted at the Jewish community. More than 1,000 people were attending an event on the beach to celebrat

item.title: Two gunmen who killed 15 people at Bondi Beach in Sydney on Sunday have been named in local media as Sajid Akram, 50, and his son Naveed, 24. #BondiBeach #Sydney #Australia #Police #BBCNews
item.description: Two gunmen who killed 15 people at Bondi Beach in Sydney on Sunday have been named in local media as Sajid Akram, 50, and his son Naveed, 24. #BondiBeach #Sydney #Australia #Police #BBCNews

item.title: US President Donald Trump criticised Rob Reiner on social media, saying, without evidence, that the deaths of him and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner, were linked to what he called “Trump Derangement Syndrome”. Reiner was a vocal critic of the president.
item.description: US President Donald Trump criticised Rob Reiner on social media, saying, without evidence, that the deaths of him and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner, were linked to what he called “Trump Derangement Syndrome”. Reiner was a vocal critic of the president.

item.title: The man who tackled one of the Bondi shooters has spoken from hospital as he recovers from his injuries and been visited by Anthony Albanese, who praised him as “the best of our country”. #AhmedAlAhmed #BondiBeach #Bondi #Australia #BBCNews
item.description: The man who tackled one of the Bondi shooters has spoken from hospital as he recovers from his injuries and been visited by Anthony Albanese, who praised him as “the best of our country”. #AhmedAlAhmed #BondiBeach #Bondi #Australia #BBCNews

item.title: US President Donald Trump has filed a $5bn (£3.7bn) lawsuit against the BBC over an edit of his 6 January 2021 speech in a Panorama documentary. The BBC apologised to Trump last month, but rejected his demands for compensation and disagreed there was any
item.description: US President Donald Trump has filed a $5bn (£3.7bn) lawsuit against the BBC over an edit of his 6 January 2021 speech in a Panorama documentary. The BBC apologised to Trump last month, but rejected his demands for compensation and disagreed there was any

item.title: Authorities in the Philippines have told the BBC the two alleged gunmen travelled to the country between 1 and 28 November, following reports they visited to receive "military-style training". #BondiBeach #Australia #Philippines #News #BBCNews
item.description: Authorities in the Philippines have told the BBC the two alleged gunmen travelled to the country between 1 and 28 November, following reports they visited to receive "military-style training". #BondiBeach #Australia #Philippines #News #BBCNews
